dialog.message: Looks like another drop. Ready?
Let's do this.
These guys just don't give up...
We gotta get off the streets
lets go in here.
This must be the Admin's keycard. It looks like it
goes to one of the doors nearby.
it's a Keycard, must go to one of the doors around here.
Damn, it's locked.
One of these guys has to have a key...
I probably shouldn't try to break this door...
Are you out of your mind?!
What do you mean, am I out of my mind? I saved both our lives!
We don't know that yet. Do you really think they're going to
let us out of here alive?
They will if they can't kill us. We gotta book it.
*sigh*
No other way...
The things I do for this job...
No good, it's locked.
Dammit
the door won't budge. We need to find another way down.
This is ridiculous.
What?
The whole "no mounts" thing. This trip took us, like, three days.
I don't think my feet even exist anymore.
Well, what do you want me to do about it? The rules are there for a reason.
What reason can you think of for us walking across the entire damn province?
Tell me, Farrand.
Well,
for one, horses eat things they're not supposed to.
They're invasive.
Then we can bring some feed or something. You're a higher-up now,
why don't you bring the issue to a meeting?
Oh, so then I can be "Farrand: Patron of Sloth" for the rest of my life.
Proposing amendments isn't taken lightly, you know.
Well, I guess so. Still...
three days
, man.
You shouldn't be calling me
man
, either.
We need to get into the habit of being professional
if I want to make good first impressions as a sage.
Yeah, whatever... What matters now is that we got here.
Yes. Now let's try to make this go smoothly. Remember: weapons down,
do not act out, and let me do the talking.
Emphasis on "let me do the talking".
Come on now. I thought you guys knew how to use
WASD
I'm really getting fed up now.
Lets go.
If you haven't figured it out yet..press
W A S D
on your keyboard to move.
Farrand, we have arrived at the Gates of Zeslia.
Good.
AHAHAHFUAHFUA
HOPAHAPAHAPAHPAHA
You are permitted to enter.
So... Mighty nice weather we are having today aren't we?
Waldomar has ordered we keep contact to a minimum.
Oh ok then...
Ah, Farrand, the man of the hour! I was worried you would keep us waiting!
So, did my little crew here give you a warm welcome?
Sure...
...Please, make yourself comfortable!
Would you like a cigar?
No, thank you. I would rather get straight to the point.
Well then, by all means! Tell me, why have we gathered here today?
I have come to order the halt of the Adlers' urban expansion project.
As I am sure you are aware, industrialization poses a threat to
both our environment and to our state of social well-being.
You have come to "halt me and my expansion"?
Why, whatever do you mean by that?
You know as well as I do what it means... Your further expansion
is a clear violation of the Candidus Treaty.
Ah, but Farrand, it would be selfish to keep all that land to yourself.
What’s selfish is the lavish lifestyle you live while your followers starve!
The state of my own followers is their doing. They are free
to work and live as they please.
They don't have imposed reproduction rights or live in blasted huts eating
leaves and berries like animals!
The citizens of Isthmo do not live like animals! They are simply respecting
the laws that uphold our survival.
I know your type Waldomar, your thirst for power is unquenchable,
you will not be satisfied until you have completely stripped
this land of all of it’s resources in exchange for material wealth!
It was because of people like you in the old world that Isthmo Candidus was
created as a safe haven from ecological destruction in the first place, and
I'll be damned if I let you have an inch more of it!
...Farrand, you do realize that this is sounding like more and more of
a threat on your part. I do not take kindly to threats...
Farrand!
The window!
Welcome. You two are with Nuado Province, right?
I am. My name is Farrand.
Very well. And who's the commoner?
Hey, now you wait just a min-
This is Jeremiah, my bodyguard.
Ah, okay. Step on the conveyor and let us lead the way.
Wow, this place is a dump. Don't they have any-
Unless you don't want to make it out of here, I'd suggest you stop now.
